p:
According to imaging data for 99 patients with SARS-CoV-2 pneumonia, 75% of the patients showed bilateral pneumonia, 14% showed multiple mottling and ground-glass opacity, and 1% had pneumothorax. The percentage of male patients was slightly higher than that of female patients, and the mild and moderate cases accounted for a larger proportion (80.9%). The majority of patients were 30â€“69 years (77.8%), and the proportion of children or newborns was low. 53, 54, 55 Pediatric cases mainly resulted from family clusters. Compared with the adult patients, the clinical manifestations of pediatric cases were atypical and relatively mild.
